titleInfo.title: F.A. Reeve in Washington, D.C. to O.P. Temple in Knoxville, Tennessee

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

subject.topic: Repudiationists; judiciary; clerkship; promotions; library; legislature.
R. J. Meigs; Marks, Albert Smith.

mods.note: This letter refers to Reeve`s work in Washington, D. C., as a clerk seeking promotion; names books he offers to Temple from his collection with credit; and comments on Tennessee politics.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
